original_title: Postal Service declared as essential service
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Postal Service has been declared as an essential service by the President via an extraordinary gazette dated 13th March 2023.

Trade union strike to end on Thursday as President decides to consider demands
Strike at Colombo Port leads to heated exchange with officials, and Navy
